website_summaries.verdict: Hydro Flask is a stainless-steel water bottle that comes in a wide variety of colors and gives you options on lid choice.
pros: Keeps contents cool for a very long time
Stainless steel helps keep liquid from holding odors
Other lids are available based on your preference
cons: This sports water bottle brand is not recommended for dishwasher cleaning

customer_reviews.title: real keeps stuff cold
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it has a flat bottom. The other ones I purchased with the smaller opening, are not real flat on the bottom and fall over and get dented up. This one is a little wider and harder to hang onto if you have small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: work well!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I usually do some Exercise every morning.It is very important to drink some water after exercise.So I bought this Sports Water Bottle.It say that it is Sports Water Bottle and Leak Proof. Actually,it works well!We do some Exercise at 7am.After one hour,the water still so hot.Very well! I love this product! My husband like to put ice in it.It is easy to put the ice in this bottleand my water stays cold for a long time. It's aslo easy to carry all day.I also bring it to work. High recommend!Will buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Kuhn D Chloes

customer_reviews.title: I love hydroflask a so much!
customer_reviews.text: The bottle itself is fantastic and keeping drinks cold/hot. My only complaint is the color, the black scratches WAY too easily. I repurchased this in white because my 32oz white one hides scratches a lot better. I ordered the 18oz cuz it's easier to transport to and from work. My 32oz stays home :)
customer_reviews.author: onefastricerocket

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure if this bottle is authentic! This ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if this bottle is authentic! This bottle barley keeps my water cold and when I put ice in there is lots of condensation! I bought this same brand from REI before and water stayed cold for long time and when I put ice in it the ice took forever to melt and there was never a condensation build up. I will only buy from REI going forward!
customer_reviews.author: Kamal Bhavsar

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep my water cold
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive my Hydro flask. I had heard amazing things about it. It does not keep my water cold for more than 12 hrs vs my less expensive flask keeps my water cold for more than 24 hrs. Also, it is not as durable as my less expensive flask.
customer_reviews.author: A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Travel buddy.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Keeping cold or warm for 24 hours. Perfect for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I loved it from the first time I unpacked it. I use it at my desk filled with chilled water all day.
customer_reviews.author: Shelty

customer_reviews.title: Love these products
customer_reviews.text: Just like every hydro flask product I own, it keeps things hot or cold for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: I love Hydro Flask products
customer_reviews.text: I love Hydro Flask products! Great for warm and cold liquids. I bought this as a gift for my step mom and she absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my coffee warm
customer_reviews.text: I love my hydroflask! I use it everyday and it keeps my water cold and my coffee warm which is a plus considering how I use multiple containers before that didn't work as well. It does dent pretty easily on the top but other than that it's pretty durable! A bit pricey but definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Thanh T

customer_reviews.title: Does not look authentic
customer_reviews.text: It does not feel authentic. You can tell from the quality of the metwl lining and even the coating and print of the logo. I have a hydroflask I bought from the store and it is not at all comparable to this one. Had I known, I would have spent this money on one from the store.
customer_reviews.author: collegebooks

customer_reviews.title: If you're like me and think "Hmmm 18 oz seems like a ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me and think "Hmmm 18 oz seems like a good size for a water bottle" THINK AGAIN!! I ended up returning it to exchange for the larger 32 oz size and I'm waiting for it to arrive :) UPDATE**** Received my package and I absolutely LOVE IT!! 32 oz. is the best size to go with.. It's not too big and holds a ton of water!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter wanted the type of water bottle her classmates had.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter didn't want to use any of the water bottles we already owned. She's in 8th grade and wanted one that is like her classmates - she actually won't call it a water bottle, only refers to it as a Hydro flask. She is happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your “beverage” cold
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I’ve been looking for a way to sneak booze into various events. The HydeYoFlask works perfectly. I look forward to years of not being w/o a “beverage “ at a the field, recital, or wherever I’m headed.
customer_reviews.author: Pkizzile.

customer_reviews.title: Works really well as expected
customer_reviews.text: Use this for sports and travel even on airplanes all around the world it’s very good keeps things cold or hot and easy to drink from and clean
customer_reviews.author: Allen Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great Value good price
customer_reviews.text: While I like the strap, I sometimes feel that it is going to break off that is the only flaw or down side to this water bottle and I bought it specifically because it had the strap is it very convenient for carry
customer_reviews.author: rja216

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Durable and keeps beverages cold or hot per preference. Handle on top is ideal for carrying around.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marie

customer_reviews.title: This is my second one!! Absolutely love
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute, works great, and the perfect size. I have the 32 oz but I wanted something a little smaller for day to day use and the 18 oz is perfect. I was hesitant on getting it at first because I saw a lot of reviews saying it was fake but I ordered it anyways and I do not regret it. These bottles are amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Torres

customer_reviews.title: Feels real to me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen all the reviews saying it’s fake. I ordered knowing that I could just return it. I’ve looked at this thing up and down compared it to the 32 oz one I bought from dicks sporting goods. It seems real to me. It holds ice just as long as my other one and I’m happy with it. No leaks.
customer_reviews.author: michael wurtzburger

customer_reviews.title: Water water
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for myself however my husband uses it, it keeps cold water cold for more than 6 hours

customer_reviews.title: Dosen't deserve that price.
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't as I exoected. I've tried many cheaper bottles which were better than this one. Hydro flask dosen't keep the coldest more than 6 hours..

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for a relative
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a birthday gift. It arrived as described.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift for ANYONE
customer_reviews.text: Perfect & keeps everything hot or cold for HOURS! Tossed out ALL the other plastics!

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sturdy water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy water bottle that is good for the environment, and my water taste good in it. Doesn’t leave you with any kind of metal taste, and clean up is easy.

customer_reviews.title: Keep you coffee really hot for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new commute coffee flask. I like the brand, I have a 32oz water bottle that I love. So I got the 18oz flask for Coffee. Great falsk.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bottle !
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle ! Great quality and my 8 year old loves it ! It keeps water cold all day at school and easy to open !

customer_reviews.title: 'Da-Bomb' Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is 'da-bomb'! Keeps liquids cold for over 24 hours and encourages me to drink more water because it's so refreshing! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hodel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's great, it keeps my drinks cold for a very long time and it's very durable.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I left carbonate water in it for two days and it rusted. It would always leak through the lid as well.
customer_reviews.author: Keiani

customer_reviews.title: Works well, couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this bottle. Second one I've bought as I lost my first one. Works as advertised and doesn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: This is a great investment for any person who travels
customer_reviews.text: This is a great investment for any person who travels, cares about environment or wants to have a cold drink for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome thermal flask. It does exactly as stated, keeps hot drinks hot, cold drinks cold, for a very long time. The best part for me, however, is that this is the first flask that I have used for coffee drinks that doesn't start to smell like old funky coffee. Even when forgetting coffee in it for several days it still hasn't shone any ill affects, just rinsed with water and a mild detergent, it's like new again, which is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Garcia

customer_reviews.title: They are the best.
customer_reviews.text: I never believed the hype of the hydro flask until I got one. They are the best.
customer_reviews.author: jenna

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly cold, for hours
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Keeps drinks seriously...COLD! Left it full of cold water, in my car, for about 20-30 minutes while I ran into the store. Came back out, STILL COLD! Mind you it was about 90F that day, so my car was easily 100+ degrees. BUY THIS FLASK GUYSSSS
customer_reviews.author: S&Jgoshoppin'

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum Flask
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flask that works great with both hot and cold liquid, highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Durability is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this Flask. Travels back and forth to my job. Fits perfectly in my book bag. I purchase the small one for that purpose .seeing it on my desk reminds me to drink water.

customer_reviews.title: It really keeps his drink cool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenager. He carries it with him everywhere! It really keeps his drink cool!

customer_reviews.text: Dont underestimate the size, for the price of the bottle with the amount you get its not worth it, but i still think its cute since i dont drink much

customer_reviews.title: My wife now drinks like a camel thanks to Hydro Flask
customer_reviews.text: My wife now drinks like a camel thanks to Hydro Flask. I bought this thing to help my wife drink more water during the pregnancy and she can't stop. This thing keeps your water / beverage arctic cold. I haven't tried it yet with hot products.

customer_reviews.title: I like it, keeps cold things cold and hot things ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, keeps cold things cold and hot things hot. The only problem I have with it is the rubber handle at top. I prefer the Klean Kanteen's rigid loop at the top. But that is entirely subjective. When it first came, the inside had an odd smell. It didn't go away after the initial washing, but it eventually did go away.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is good product, easy to carry & comfortable to use.

customer_reviews.text: I traveled with this while in hot and humid SE Asia. It was the best travel investment and was able to keep cold water cool for a bit more than half the day each day when I filled it up with cold water.

customer_reviews.title: Loved the bottle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Totally satisfied! Flask came in perfect condition and on time. Couldn't be happier!

customer_reviews.title: Compact and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Love how small it is, very convenient as well, and my water is always cold or warm! Bottle is also very very light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does great at school
customer_reviews.text: And skateboarding, airplane trips, surfing, marching band practice, camping, hiking, orchestra and where ever else my teenage son takes it. The first extremely well-traveled Hydro Flask was stolen (maybe it was the multiple layers of skateboarding stickers?) much to his dismay. But I think it was money well spent and didn't hesitate to buy an identical replacement. He likes to fill it with half water and half ice for cold water all day long. 18oz seems to be the perfect size to fit in the water bottle pouch on the outside of most backpacks. Or he can carabiner the loop on the top to his trumpet case strap. Maybe I'll buy yet one more just in case...
customer_reviews.author: Owen's Mom

customer_reviews.title: great flask, use it every day
customer_reviews.text: I love this flask. I practice hot yoga and my water stays at whatever temperature I start with. I like the screw top. It is not going to leak in my duffle bag and it comes off with a couple of turns so it's handy enough. Some of my yoga classes are quiet and I can open and close this flask without making any noise. Do not over-tighten as it makes it difficult to open. It strikes the right balance of size (not too large) and capacity (large enough).
customer_reviews.author: Smart Dude

customer_reviews.title: Discoloration but No Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I received the 40 oz wide mouth in yellow as a (camping) gift a few years ago and it's wonderful. I recently bought the 20 oz size in black as a gift for someone and spots on the finish showed up within 10 days, possibly from a dishwasher but I'm not sure. It's a leak-proof and sturdy water bottle, but it's pretty spendy for that kind of discoloration.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Best insulated water bottle I’ve ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my drink cold. I add ice inside. The ice doesn’t melt for several hours. Sturdy and leak proof. Easy twist on cap.
customer_reviews.author: Buzy_reading

customer_reviews.title: Hydro Flask
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Hydro Flask, it's a quality brand and this is my second Flask. I have a much larger one and I actually got this one as a gift for a friend. It never sweats and keeps drinks cool for hours ( I haven't used mine for hot drinks). Great Product, great gift, I would really recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cas

customer_reviews.title: Didn't expect to be as impressed as I was
customer_reviews.text: Keeps ice water cold for at least 2 hours, warm drinks for about 10, that's all I have tested. I didn't actually expect to be as impressed with this bottle as I am. It doesn't keep the coffee smell which is great too
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Stop using plastic, get this water bottle
customer_reviews.text: The silicone seal Needs a little extra cleaning because it might start to smell but other than that this is a great bottle! Ice was intact for several hours when indoors. Great way to save the planet, ditch single use plastic bottles!!!!! I try to take this everywhere, including restaurants/coffee shops and have not been turned away yet.
customer_reviews.author: Usagiiichan

customer_reviews.title: Worked!
customer_reviews.text: Mine worked great and didn’t leak. I can’t believe it actually kept my drink cold from morning till afternoon!! Very shocked

customer_reviews.title: There are cheaper bottles that are just as good.
customer_reviews.text: Good insulated bottle, but way too expensive for what it is. There are cheaper bottles that are just as good.

customer_reviews.title: Good insulated water bottle but package not well protected.
customer_reviews.text: The water bottle is quite good. Good insulation and style. The only problem was that the bottel arrived with one small bend probalbly caused during delivery.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality. 😀
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my purchase. :) very good quality.

customer_reviews.text: Yes !! its the best for keeping my coffee warm.👍

customer_reviews.title: Great Product

The lip of the bottle is comfortable to drink from, but if you are not careful you can spill it easily. The coating of the bottle has a nice touch, but it may be slippery if you have dry hands. But overall great bottle, best one I have ever had!

product_meta.title: Hydro Flask Water Bottle - Stainless Steel & Vacuum Insulated - Wide Mouth with Leak Proof Flex Cap - 18 oz, Black
feature_bullets: Newly produced Hydro Flasks do not feature a registered trademark symbol next to the logo
Keeps beverages cold up to 24 hours and hot up to 12 hours when using the lid
BPA-free and phthalate-free; 18/8 food-grade stainless steel
Compatible with our Hydro Flip Lid and Wide Mouth Straw Lid
